attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248326. 6Year 150 000km Warranty


The NP200 projects a no-nonsense attitude, effortlessly combining practical ruggedness with modern flair.

Storage areas such as the glove box, door bins and drink holders under the central console are logically arranged, so everyday items are always within easy reach. The NP200 also offers a full 300 litres of storage space behind the seats to accommodate anything else you might need for a weekend getaway.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877215217. This spacious CX-5 2.0 Active comes with A 3 YEAR UNLIMITED KM WARRANTY AND SERVICE PLAN. a very ideal vehicle for a family or anybody that enjoys a big body car. A Multifunction steering wheel Built for in city and off road. It has cool features such as Keyless entry, Bluetooth radio, Android /Apple Carplay, Electronic handbrake. It has a very peculiar sonic silver colour, Electronic Brake Distribution(EBD), Anti-lock Braking System(ABS). A rear View camera, for obstructed views. 2 cup holders for the driver and passenger and another 2 at the back as well as 2 USB pods to charge your phone while you're long trips. 

The price excludes dealer fees and 35% LUMAR 100 Micron Smash and Grab Safety Film. Errors and omissions Reserved. T&Cs apply

attributes.description:
Finance can be arranged, Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees, 80 point quality check, Very neat, Trade-ins accepted, Test drives welcome, Nationwide delivery.

Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Toyota Bryanston.
